@Mazreth posted Area Combat Entry Locations

A crimson liveried messenger marches in. With crisp, precise movements, he unfurls a scroll and announces:

Raffle tables have been set up throughout the lands in hopes of finding worthy combatants for the upcoming Festival of the Fallen to be held outside the elven city-state of Ta'Vaalor. Each table will randomly select five combatants. The tables have been placed in areas that require FULL citizenship in the realm they represent to access. If a municipality does not provide the full five combatants, more will be chosen through a second, unrestricted, drawing in Ta'Vaalor. Good luck to all who enter. The locations for the entry tables are as follows:

  • Teras Isle: The Hog's Pen, Citizens Lounge
  • Rivers Rest: A Derelict Hovel
  • Solhaven: A Derelict Hovel
  • Icemule Trace: Thirsty Penguin, Game Room
  • Whenimer's Landing: Moot Hall, Orchard
  • Cysaegir: Cysaegir, West Niche
  • Ta'Illistim: Ta'Illistim, Tower of Shadows
  • Ta'Vaalor: Guardian Keep, Chamber
  • Mist Harbor: West Guardtower, Interior
  • Zul Logoth: A Derelict Hovel

~Mazreth

To fill remaining bracket locations, a raffle will be set out within the Festival of the Fallen grounds on opening night and will draw Saturday morning. All entrants chosen at this drawing will not be considered Champions of any such town but merely eager participants of the arena.
